}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== *[[Broadcom]] [http://www.cypress.com/products/wi-fi-bluetooth-combos BCM43438] (WiFi/BT 4.1) • [http://www.cypress.com/file/298076/download DS] :WICED 1T1R 802.11bgn (150Mbps) <!-- :SDIO 02d0:a9a6 4.1+ ([https://wireless.wiki.kernel.org/en/users/Drivers/brcm80211 brcm80211])
Module AP6212 used in [[Banana Pi BPI M2 Ultra]] and [[Khadas Vim]] --> {{See also|AMPAK|Allwinner}}
